name: S.H.I.P.S.
description:
Ships Have Interlinked Power Supplies, or S.H.I.P.S., is a simple arcade game. You hold out against the alien forces as long as you can, using only your fleet of four space ships.

A controller is required to play, and it needs to be connected before starting the game (sorry!).

The is game developed for the Ludum Dare 47 Jam with theme "Stuck in a loop". My first solo game jam entry. I planned to use WebGL but it does not load for (to me) unknown reason, I suspect it is the controller support.


Credits:

Background Music: “Chamber of Secrets”, from PlayOnLoop.com
